name: Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer with Hyaluronic Acid + Niacinamide
about: What it is: An award-winning longwear gel makeup primer that grips makeup for up to 12 hours and hydrates with hyaluronic acid and niacinamide for a dewy finish...Finish: Radiant..Formulation: Lightweight, Gel..Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Blue Agave Extract: Grips makeup to prevent melting, fading, and caking..- Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Boost hydration to visibly smooth uneven texture..- Aloe Water + Hemp-derived Cannabis Seed Extract: Provide additional boost of hydration to lock in moisture...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This first-of-its-kind grippy (not sticky!) silicone-free primer combines active levels of skincare like hydrating hyaluronic acid & glow-boosting niacinamide with makeup-gripping blue agave extract, so makeup goes on smooth and lasts all day. No patchiness. No heavy feel. Just a dewy glow...Clinical Results: In a consumer perception study with 15 people in a 12-hour period:.-100% said makeup lasted longer.-100% said skin has a healthy-looking glow.-100% said skin feels more hydrated..
ingredients: -Blue Agave Extract: Grips makeup to prevent melting, fading, and caking. .- Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Boost hydration to visibly smooth uneven texture..- Aloe Water + Hemp-derived Cannabis Seed Extract: Provide additional boost of hydration to lock in moisture...Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Alcohol Denat., PEG-150 Distearate, Polyglyceryl-10 Eicosanedioate/Tetradecanedioate, Diglycerin, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Extract, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Prunus Avium (Sweet Cherry) Flower Extract, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Sorbitol, Pullulan, Inositol, Betaine, Carbomer, Maltose, Xylitol, Sodium Hydroxide, PVP, Propylene Glycol, Panthenol, Vegetable Amino Acids, Sodium Phytate, Citric Acid, Alcohol, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:. -Apply one to two pumps of primer onto the back of your hand. .-Blend a thin layer onto clean skin before makeup application. .-Let the formula set for 60 seconds to absorb and activate grip for all-day hold..-Layer foundation and other makeup on top for a smooth application that lasts all day or wear alone for a dewy glow. .-End your routine with Hydro Grip Set + Refresh Spray (sold separately) for extra long-lasting makeup. .-Pro Tip: To prevent pilling, let skincare and sunscreen fully absorb before primer application. Start with one pump and add more if needed.

reviews.review_text: Milk Makeup's Hydro Grip Primer is a game-changer for anyone looking to enhance their makeup's staying power while keeping skin hydrated. Upon application, it creates a tacky finish that grips makeup, ensuring long-lasting wear without feeling heavy or greasy. It also works well for all skin types, particularly those with dry or combination skin, as it provides a smooth, dewy base. The primer is also cruelty-free and free from parabens, sulfates, and phthalates, making it a clean and conscious choice. Overall, it’s a must-have for anyone seeking a flawless, fresh look that lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Hydro Milk Grip Primer, and it has completely transformed my makeup routine! This primer is an absolute game-changer for anyone who wants a flawless, long-lasting base. The texture is lightweight, yet it provides a hydrating, dewy finish without feeling greasy. It grips onto my foundation like glue, ensuring my makeup stays intact all day—even through heat and humidity. I also love that it’s infused with skincare benefits, leaving my skin feeling smooth and moisturized. What impressed me the most is how it blurs imperfections and minimizes pores, creating the perfect canvas for makeup application. Whether you have dry, oily, or combination skin, this primer adapts beautifully without causing any pilling or patchiness. If you’re looking for a primer that locks in moisture and gives your makeup serious staying power, Hydro Milk Grip is 100% worth the hype! Highly recommend adding this to your routine—you won’t be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was kindly gifted the Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Primer, and I’ve been so excited to try it out!  Application: The primer feels incredibly smooth as I apply it. It has a gel-like texture that goes on effortlessly, blending into the skin with no tugging or stickiness at first, but it quickly transforms into a gripping, tacky finish that’s perfect for holding makeup in place.  Longevity: I noticed that my makeup lasted way longer than usual when I used this primer. My foundation stayed put throughout the day without any noticeable fading, even after several hours. The Hydro Grip Primer definitely lives up to its claims of enhancing makeup longevity.  Hydration: My skin feels noticeably more hydrated when using this primer, which is great for my dry skin. It adds a subtle moisture boost without feeling greasy, so my skin looks fresh and dewy all day.  Overall, I’m super impressed with this primer! It really does give that fresh, long-lasting makeup look while keeping my skin hydrated. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a primer that delivers on both performance and comfort!

reviews.review_text: The milk hydro grip primer is great. I have combination-oily skin. Kept my skin hydrated and the my makeup was long-lasting no creasing under the eyes or separation in the the smile lines. Rating this 10/10.

For my base, I paired it with a lightweight, medium-coverage foundation, and the two worked perfectly together! My skin looked fresh and flawless for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is a popular choice among beauty enthusiasts due to its lightweight, gel-based formula that combines skincare benefits with makeup performance. Infused with hydrating ingredients like aloe vera and hyaluronic acid, it helps to lock in moisture, making it ideal for dry or combination skin types. The “grip” effect is achieved through its tacky finish, which enhances makeup adherence and longevity. This primer is also known for creating a dewy, radiant base, giving the skin a fresh, plump appearance. It’s free of silicones, vegan, and cruelty-free, appealing to those seeking clean beauty products. However, some users with oily skin may find it a bit too hydrating, potentially causing makeup to slide if not set properly. Overall, the Hydro Grip Primer is an excellent choice for those looking for a hybrid skincare-makeup product that boosts hydration and ensures long-lasting wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: My Experience with Milk’s Mini HydroGrip Hydrating
reviews.review_text: If I had to describe this primer in one word, it would be wow. From the moment I tried it, I understood why so many people rave about it. The texture is super lightweight—like a gel that melts into the skin—leaving a hydrating finish without feeling heavy. Say goodbye to dry skin before makeup! What impressed me the most was how it truly helps my makeup stay put all day. It’s like a magnet for makeup—locking it in place without any sticky feeling. Plus, its vegan and clean formula is a huge bonus for me when choosing products for my routine. In short, the Mini Hydro Grip Primer by Milk doesn’t just deliver—it exceeds expectations! It’s perfect for anyone looking for hydration, long-lasting wear, and a flawless base for makeup. It’s definitely a must-have in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Milk Makeup's **Hydro Grip Primer** is a standout product for those looking to boost hydration while ensuring their makeup stays put all day. Here’s my experience:  ### **Smooth Application**   The primer has a lightweight, gel-like texture that feels super smooth and glides effortlessly onto the skin. It absorbs quickly, leaving a slightly tacky finish that helps makeup adhere better.  ### **Makeup Longevity**   The Hydro Grip Primer definitely helped my makeup last longer! I noticed that my foundation stayed in place throughout the day without any signs of fading or slipping, even in warmer conditions. It creates a great canvas for long-lasting wear.  ### **Hydration Boost**   My skin felt noticeably more hydrated after applying the primer. It has a refreshing feel and leaves a soft, plump finish without feeling greasy, which is a huge plus for my dry skin.  ### **Base Product**   I paired the Hydro Grip Primer with **Milk Makeup's Sunshine Skin Tint** for a light, dewy base. The two products work really well together, giving me a natural, glowing look that lasted all day.  Overall, I’m really happy with the Hydro Grip Primer. It’s hydrating, smooth, and helps my makeup stay put, making it a must-have for anyone with dry skin or looking for lasting makeup wear.

reviews.review_text: Don’t be scared because this is a “gripping” primer. The grip isn’t extreme and it’s just enough to hold your makeup in place. I love the texture of it and how it doesn’t mess with the integrity of the base of my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product before and have bought other dupes of it before but i have forgotten how good the original truly is. I love this primer and it will always be one of my favorites to use and try with my makeup.

This product is great it made my makeup stay all day long and I really love that I haven’t had a primer that actually worked in a long time ! It doesn’t have a smell and it’s just right I am very pleased with this gifted by milk

reviews.review_title: The Perfect Primer for Everyday Natural Makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Milk Hydro Grip Primer for a while now, and I love it! I don’t do heavy or bright makeup, but anyway this primer is perfect for my everyday routine. It’s lightweight, keeps my foundation looking smooth, and helps it stay put throughout the day without feeling sticky. My skin stays hydrated without any patchiness. A little goes a long way, and even though I’m not big on makeup, this has become an essential part of my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product been using it for year to help with my dry skin and the dryness out here in the south would 1000% recommend this to anyone who has dry skin it also great for keeping makeup in place

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The hydro grip hydrating makeup primer is no joke! This stuff hides your pores and leaves your make up looking so smooth and flawless. This in combination with the refresh spray lock all my makeup in place all day! Definitely a new staple in my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Great texture. Good ingredients. Great action. Most of all I love that this product is natural, silicone-free, and oil-free. Highly recommend! You’ll love this from your first use. I promise! 🤍🤍🤍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this primer and wow it’s one of my favs and also my family members. They were the ones who told me about it and that’s why I first went for it so glad they made a travel size made my life easier

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is great for hydration as well as leaving a tacking feeling on your face in order for your face makeup to stick well to it. this primer doesn’t have your foundation bawling up or not letting you blend. i love it for all seasons and for a long day or a night out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just discovered the most amazing primer! It creates a smooth canvas for my makeup, helps my foundation last all day, and gives my skin a radiant glow. I've noticed a huge difference in how my makeup looks and feels since I started using it. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The primer applied very smooth! It did make my makeup last longer! My skin feels more hydrated! My base product I used with Hydro Grip was Clinique Foundation! Would recommend! If you’re looking for a primer, this one is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this hydrogrip primer. I feel like i genuinely see a difference in my makeup application and it lasts longer than it typically would without it. I recommenced this to anyone who’s looking to try a new primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In just one time I’ve use this product, it lasted my makeup for 13 hours ! AMAZING! It’s light weight and perfect for combination skin. Making it a must have for my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this primer! I’ve been looking for a new primer for a really long time cause my skin just doesn’t work well with a lot of them but this one truly takes the cake. it’s long lasting and doesn’t pill!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is super cool because it’s hydrating and at the same time hold makeup in place! I tested it out and so far it looks pretty good, it feels like it stick wells to the makeup and is a good base. (gifted)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It’s so hard to find a long lasting, sticky primer that also hydrates your skin! My makeup lasts all day long and just goes on the skin so smoothly with this primer. I’m constantly traveling too so I love that they made a travel size product of this! Def 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer works great. I absolutely love it. I have used lots of different brands but for me this has worked the best. I did a smudge test and when paired with the setting spray I had no transfer. I will continue to use this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this as a makeup primer today. I have always loved my foundation but now I love it even more after using this primer. I can’t wait to show my BFF and tell her she should get some too! I will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much, it was recommended from some friends and I haven’t gone back! My base just feels so hydrated and ready so the whole day I really feel like I’m glowing and not worried about my makeup moving all day !

reviews.review_title: Best for an all day makeup look!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup primer from MILK is the best for an all day make up look. The formula is sticky yet it does not feel that way on the skin rather after a few seconds my skin feels hydrated. I definitely recommend this primer to anyone who wears there makeup all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This primer was the most popular of the year for a reason. It makes my makeup adhere really well to the skin and lasts a long time. It also moisturizes my skin in an incredible way and makes the skin look beautiful. I will continue using it next year.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer. It is my favorite primer for helping make makeup last longer. I am acne prone and many other primers make me break out but this one does not cause break outs for me. I will continue repurchasing this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really impressed with this hydro grip primer and it's ability to hold makeup smooth and flawless for a longer time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very impressed with this product. Helped with full coverage and great ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is a game-changer! The travel size is perfect for tossing in my bag, and the formula lives up to the hype. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and creates the perfect canvas for makeup application. The grip is amazing—my foundation stays put all day without creasing or fading.  I also love that it doesn’t feel heavy or sticky on my skin. Instead, it gives me a subtle glow and smooths out any imperfections. Whether you’re traveling or just looking for a high-quality primer, this one is worth every penny. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this primer it leaves the skin feeling tacky and makes my makeup last longer through the day. And it hydrates my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The way this primer literally lives up to all of the hype it has received is amazing. When they call it a grip primer, it truly is not an exaggeration. It had my makeup flawless. If you’re thinking of investing in a great primer, this is the one!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Milk Hydro Grip Hydrating Primer keeps makeup flawless all day with its lightweight, hydrating, and slightly tacky finish. It works beautifully for both no-makeup days and full glam without causing irritation or breakouts. Though a bit pricey, it’s worth every penny for its long-lasting hold and hydration. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I always heard so much hype around this makeup primer and at first I didn’t understand why but after trying it I can totally get why everyone is obsessed. It helps my foundation look so smooth and I literally look poreless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Hydro grip hydrating makeup primer is my go to primer! It helps with the longevity of my make up to last all day long! I always keep a full size bottle at home and take the travel size with me on vacations. A little truly goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved it, it's super sticky which makes the foundation adhere to the skin for longer. It's super long-lasting. I love using it with foundations like the one from Haus Lab, it's perfect. I feel that the price is a little high, but I will definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my first favorites, I love that it lasts a long time. My foundation is super light and sticky, which makes the foundation adhere better. It lasts a long time. I would definitely buy it again, and for the price I do feel that it is a little expensive.

reviews.review_title: Absolutely needed for every morning routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved using hydro drip as it held my makeup all day long and still looked flawless at the end of the day. This is a item that needs to be in everyone's morning routine to keep there makeup flawless and fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For years, the Milk Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer has been my go-to base before applying makeup. I have tried many face primers, but none have compared to this product. I break out very easily from makeup and have not experienced any issues from using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought this about 2 years ago and it was a spray application. Not sure if I bought a different version or the application changed, but I’m not a fan of the gel. It begins to peel after applying foundation, no matter how long I wait for the gel to sit. If I apply my makeup with spend and lightly tap, the peeling is minimal but definitely still present.

reviews.review_title: Really good primer worth the hype!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Milk Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer! As someone with acne and visible pores, this primer is a game changer. It goes on clear and feels light, making my foundation glide on effortlessly.   Right after i apply this one, my skin feels smoother and hydrated, and it really helps blur my pores. I’ve noticed my makeup lasts longer throughout the day without feeling heavy. If you're looking for a primer that locks in hydration and makes your makeup look flawless, I highly recommend this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Milk Makeup primer! It has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. The texture is lightweight and smooth, and it creates the perfect base for foundation. Not only does it help my makeup last all day, but it also keeps my skin looking hydrated and fresh. I have combination skin, and this primer does a great job balancing oil control without drying me out. Another bonus is that it grips makeup really well, so I never have to worry about fading or patchiness. The clean ingredients and the vegan formula are huge pluses for me, too. Overall, I highly recommend this primer to anyone looking for a reliable, high-quality product to elevate their makeup game!

So excited. Everyone says this is sort of tacky and makes makeup stick to your face and I truly did not know how I would like that but here we are! I think everyone I know who wears makeup has heard of this primer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for about two weeks. I am in love with this. The primer keeps my makeup on point and it all stays in place. My makeup is fresh all day long. I use all shades, and types of makeup. It keeps my pores hidden. I love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t like the feeling of it on my skin and not liking the smell either so it’s a no for me

reviews.review_title: Effective product, my skin hated it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works really well to make my foundation last all day. Unfortunately it smells like formaldehyde and I break out every time I use it, so not for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They should revise the formula, it feels very sticky on the face and doesn’t give a radiant finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is like butter made for skin. Rubbing it onto my skin feels so soft and it hold my makeup very well. This was my first primer to ever try and I’m so happy I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: not sure if i would say this is worth the price. it definitely feels smoother and less sticky than the elf primer but it just doesn’t seem worth the price point

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these primers for everyday + holiday full glam makeup looks because they are affordable, travel friendly, and a great base for layering products without seeing pores. I specifically love the illuminatrice base of the glow primer because it acts as highlight for a glowy finish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very disappointed. Product arrived 30% empty. I’ll include a photo, i havnt even opened it and its missing a significant amount of product. how does this even happen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not enjoy this product. It make my face pill and splotchy, I unfortunately had to redo my entire face of makeup. The smell was nice and refreshing but that was the only thing I could enjoy from it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product a hand full of times and it was working great until the last time I used it it gave me a chemical burn like rash with a bunch of painful tiny pimples! After having it on for a few hours my face felt itchy and after I took my makeup off I saw the rash. There’s something in this that is giving a bad reaction. I don’t have sensitive skin and this has never happened to me ever in my life before! So disappointed cause I did like the product until it ruined my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The primer gets the job done but my skin feels a little bit dry when applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical at first but after using it a couple of weeks the results are amazing my makeup stays on all day! You do need to let it dry for a minute before applying your foundation otherwise it will start pilling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was concerned about this primer because a lot of people said it caused them peeling, but I decided to give it a shot and I’m absolutely obsessed! My skin used to be oily, but now I’m super dehydrated, so this primer perfectly hydrated my skin and perfectly matches my Dior Backstage foundation. I will definitely buy this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer doesn't play well with most of my foundations. The only foundation I can use on top of this is the Haus Labs Triclone foundation otherwise it pills like crazy. I tried to use minimal skincare products before using this and still the same. It pills!! I also don't see any difference in terms of longevity so for me this is a pass! I think there are better options out there that work with most, if not, all foundations.

reviews.review_title: It’s been 2 years, still not good.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought when it first came out, it needed time. But after other batches or trying with same base foundations, this primer is just dry magnet making pores more visible. Terrible. Not sure how milk is still on the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a grip on my and my makeup! After using it for a week, I can’t get over how well this performs. My skin is oily which causes my makeup and eye makeup to melt by lunch but this keeps everything lasting untill I’m ready to remove it at the end of the day.

reviews.review_title: Use it twice a week at least.
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Texture feels good and thick but didn’t work very well on my super dry skin. It did not ‘hydrate’ as the name suggests- would just absorb leaving my skin feeling drier than before. Will be moving to a different brand!

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love it so bad…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so disappointed in this product. I have tried it several times and really really wanted it to work since it has such great hype. Every time I use this, my makeup pills like crazyyy. Like to the point where anything over it will literally peel off. My foundation is water based, and to make sure that wasn’t the issue I even used it with two other foundations and has the same issue. I have used several different amounts, wondering if I was using too much or too little to the same end. I simply cannot use this if I I don’t want it to look like my skin is peeling off!
Causes my makeup to peel, despite both products being water-based

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Milk Hydrogrip Primer has a tacky finish and feels pretty hydrating. Does what it says -- grips your makeup. I use this with Glossier Skin Tint + Glossier Foundation. Works pretty well with this combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not as hydrating as I thought it would be. There are better drugstore ones out there. Including the elf one. I use this under my eyes where it often dries out and creases. This isn’t the worst, but there is better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this product for a while already and every time I've used this primer it would always peel in certain areas, like my temples and my cheek area. This primer does have the grip effect but It's not worth using with the peeling issue

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super dry skin, during winter time my skin will flake so much that makeup usually gets patchy or creases. This has helped so much! I love how it leaves my skin so hydrated and prepped for makeup. I definitely recommend to get this if you have dry skin and want a dewy look.

reviews.review_title: Poor performance because it grips too much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Like others have mentioned, this makes your foundation appear super patchy. It's almost like the thing it's describing it'll do, i.e. grip, is done too well. There's really no wiggle room - if you apply this primer unevenly (which most likely is the case), the unevenness will show up once you apply foundation on top of it. The only way I've kind of been able to keep using it just so I'm not wasting the product is to use it with a powder foundation. Unfortunately this is not something I'll purchase again.

reviews.review_title: I think it's okay, but nothing I'll buy again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've done 10+ full glam looks with this primer under the Armani luminous silk foundation, and I'm still not sure if I'm in love. It is definitely tacky and feels cooling on the skin, but I'm not sure it makes a massive difference in my makeup longevity or skin feeling hydrated. Maybe my skin prep isn't the best (I use vanicream moisturizer under), but it just doesn't seem to be anything special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's a sticky primer. what else is to say? works good I don't know I'd buy again though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: made my makeup pill (sometimes while I was still blending it out) no matter how i applied it. was very disappointed as i'm newer to makeup and this was my first primer!! not for me :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the smooth hydrated look it helped give my foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Always makes my foundation patchy.. this primer is supposed to be water based but now I'm not sure that's true.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This ticks all the boxes. It is light weight and a great balance between coverage and hydration.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_text: I have used this product a few times before i did my make up and I am in love with it. I was missing something in my make up routine and I finally found the missing piece!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i got this as a sample audit is so good my makeup stays on all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a first-time user of this product. I like the way it feels so far. A bit sticky but a nice hydrating glow. The bottle/applicator didn't travel well as has leaked all over but I'll use it until finished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this has really helped with flakey patches and lasting power of my foundations. I might try something else in the future though, as aloe and my skin don't get along that well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is an absolute game-changer! It provides a smooth, hydrating base that grips makeup perfectly, keeping it in place all day without any fading. The lightweight formula feels refreshing on the skin, and the dewy finish gives a healthy glow. Plus, it's suitable for all skin types, even sensitive skin. A must-have in any makeup routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my staple primer for everyday makeup. I have oily skin and this helps my makeup stay on all day when used with a good setting spray. Make sure to dab it on and let it sit few a few minutes before applying your foundation!   This mini version lives in my travel suitcase and goes to every business trip with me. The only downside is the fact that it’s not refillable but in this day and age, I’m sure it’s something MILK will take into consideration when discussing product improvement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this primer from the first time I tried it. It hydrates my face in an incredible way and makes my face look fresh and radiant, my skin no longer looks cracked when I put on the foundation and loose powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this finally after hearing so many positive things I am highly let down. What is this even supposed to do? Not a fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best primer ever! I have sworn by this for so long - it makes my skin feel great even after I remove it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The milk hydro grip primer is a holy grail products. It’s hydrating and also makes my makeup last all day. My makeup applies nicely on top. I love the stickiness the primer gives to hold the makeup to your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the softness it leaves on my skin, it is very light and absorbs more quickly into my skin, leaving a shiny finish, my pores are not as noticeable and I love that, you only need a small amount to get the benefit I want and need, the package is nice and the price is reasonable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Milk Makeup always makes products that my skin enjoys! I was a bit unsure of my initial feelings on the texture/application of the primer, but after seeing the results once I followed the rest of my makeup routine I was completely won over! My makeup didn’t look cake-y like it has using some other primer bases, and I didn’t feel like it clogged my pores either. Overall a great product to have in your collection! I was gifted this product from Milk Makeup in exchange for my honest review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good primer for my skin type. I have dry skin and after using this my skin feels hydrated and my makeup last longer. I just dislike the chemical scent it has when blending it to my skin but it goes away. I give it a 9 out of 10 for that reason.

reviews.review_title: Good for dry skin, not as grippy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This a good primer for more natural makeup days. It was hydrating and felt nice on the skin, but it was not as tacky or sticky as the original. If the og is too grippy, then this is a great option for dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best primer i have ever used! It Keeps my makeup on for HOURS- even in hot weather being outside for 8+ hours my makeup stays all day long. It’s hydrating and smooth on my skin. Highly recommend for everyday use and especially events!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the main issues I have with my foundations is the foundation melting or streaking. I work so hard applying my foundation and blush for it to get a streak on my cheeks. I want the best primer for my foundation. The Texas weather can cause my foundation to melt away. This primer from Milk has helped my foundation increase its staying power as well as stay streak free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this primer! I haven’t been able to find another primer that actually works with the products I have without making my makeup look patchy and it makes my makeup last throughout the whole day! It deserves the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been wanting to try this Hydro Grip primer from Milk Makeup from quite some time now and let me just say it did not disappoint. As someone with combination skin that tends to have an oily t-zone AND sweat a lot in the Texas heat, I am always looking for good primer options to help smooth and prep my skin for better and longer makeup wear. This gel-like primer has hydrating hyaluronic acid along with niacinamide that helps give the skin a dewy finish before applying your foundation. It provides almost instant hydration along with a lovely smoothing appearance once applied. I love how the lightweight gel texture and that a little product is all you need. It definitely has extended the wear time and quality of my makeup even in these last hot days of summer. I am truly pretty impressed and think this will be my go-to primer especially for the summer months. It isn't heavy on the skin and I've tried it with multiple different foundations and it worked equally as well with each one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Milk Makeup! The hydrating makeup primer works great on my combo skin! Since winter season is near, I’m definitely going to be reaching for this primer! The packaging looks classic and sleek. The pump applicator is easy to use. I appreciate the sturdy cap.  There’s a cooling sensation that i experienced while applying the product on my face. It gentle not strong. A little goes a long way on my face. I’m loving the ingredients in this product as well! Blue agave extract, aloe water, hemp, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide! The scent isn’t strong, so don’t worry. It’s a slight hint of aloe but fades away. I don’t have great sunlight at the moment. My skin is glowing and looks hydrated! This primer is not sticky at all! I recommend this primer for your love ones and yourself! Looking forward to try more products from Milk!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Milk Hydro Grip Hydrating Primer has become a go-to for me, especially on days when I want that extra hydration boost. I love how refreshing and hydrating it feels on my skin, making it a perfect addition to my skincare routine. The gel-like texture gives my makeup a smooth, tacky base, helping everything stay put for hours without fading. Plus, the added hyaluronic acid and aloe vera leave my skin feeling plump and soothed, which is such a bonus. One thing I’ve noticed, though, is that it doesn’t work well with oil-based foundations. The first time I tried it with one, my makeup started pilling, which was a bit frustrating. Now that I know to avoid oil-based formulas with this primer, it’s been smooth sailing, but it does limit which foundations I can use. That said, when I use it with the right foundation, the staying power is amazing! My makeup lasts all day, and I get a nice, dewy finish without feeling greasy. If you're after hydration and long-lasting wear, this primer is definitely worth it—as long as you pair it with the right products!

What I love most is that it’s clean, vegan, and free of harsh ingredients like parabens, silicones, and fragrance, which makes it perfect for sensitive skin. Overall, this primer does an excellent job of gripping makeup while also nourishing the skin, making it a staple in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received something in exchange for this post. The Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer by Milk Makeup is a standout product in the realm of makeup primers, offering impressive hydration and staying power. Its unique, gel-based formula is infused with a blend of hydrating ingredients such as aloe water, hyaluronic acid, and cactus extract, which work together to provide a smooth, dewy base for makeup application. The primer's grip technology creates a tacky layer on the skin, ensuring that foundation and other products adhere more effectively and last longer throughout the day. One of the primer's key benefits is its versatility; it works well for various skin types, including dry and combination skin. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly without feeling greasy, making it ideal for those who want a hydrating boost without compromising on a matte finish. Users also appreciate the primer's ability to minimize the appearance of pores and fine lines, providing a flawless canvas for makeup. However, some users might find the initial tacky feeling slightly unusual, though it usually fades as the primer sets. Overall, the Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is a reliable choice for anyone seeking to enhance makeup longevity while maintaining a hydrated, fresh look.

Here’s an extended review of Milk’s Hydro Grip+ Glow Primer:  ---  I've recently started using Milk’s Hydro Grip+ Glow Primer, and it has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. The primer promises a 12-hour grip, and it truly delivers. My makeup remains intact and fresh throughout the day, with no need for touch-ups. This is a game-changer for long days or events where you need your look to last.  One of the things I appreciate most about this primer is how it feels on my skin. It provides an immediate sense of hydration, making my skin feel plump and smooth. This creates an excellent base for applying foundation, ensuring an even application and a flawless finish. The primer’s texture is lightweight and comfortable, which is a huge plus for daily wear.  Another highlight is the dewy, radiant finish it imparts. It adds a luminous glow to my skin, enhancing the overall makeup look with a fresh and healthy sheen. This dewy finish is perfect for achieving a natural, glowing complexion, whether you’re aiming for a subtle daytime look or a more polished evening appearance. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is a game-changer for anyone seeking a smooth, hydrated base for their makeup. This innovative primer boasts a unique jelly-like formula that glides onto the skin effortlessly, leaving behind a velvety canvas for your foundation and other products.  The Hydro Grip Primer is incredibly easy to apply. A small amount dotted onto the face and blended out with your fingers or a brush is all you need. The primer sinks into the skin almost instantly, creating a smooth and even surface. It's lightweight and doesn't leave any greasy or sticky residue.   One of the most impressive qualities of the Hydro Grip Primer is its ability to extend the wear time of your makeup. I noticed a significant difference when using this primer; my foundation and concealer stayed put all day long, even through sweat and humidity.   As the name suggests, the Hydro Grip Primer is extremely hydrating. It contains a blend of hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and aloe vera that leaves the skin feeling supple and refreshed. I found that it helped to minimize the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, giving my skin a more youthful glow.  The Hydro Grip Primer works well with a variety of base products. I tried it with both liquid and powder foundations, and it performed equally well with both. It didn't alter the coverage or finish of my foundation and allowed it to blend seamlessly into my skin.  The Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is an absolute must-have for anyone who wants a smooth, hydrated, and long-lasting makeup base. Its innovative formula glides on effortlessly, creates an even canvas, and keeps your makeup looking fresh all day long. Whether you have dry, oily, or combination skin, this primer will leave your complexion looking its best. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_text: Great primer! There’s no strong smell which is nice for those sensitive. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this b/c it's highly rated on a few big name beauty sites/mags, and I was duped. This primer made the rest of my makeup separate all over my face, and I looked splotchy & awful. This is the only new product that I was using; I was already using the rest of my makeup & skin care products before I tried this primer.  I started seeing videos on social media saying to use water-based primers, like this one, with other water-based makeup. Well, the primer I used before this Milk one is also water-based (according to the internet), and the rest of my makeup never separated like it does with this Milk one. I do not have the money & interest to waste in changing the rest of my makeup to find products that will play nicely with this primer.   I followed the instructions in letting the primer set for 60 seconds. I applied with my fingers. It feels slightly tacky/sticky when applied, but I didn't mind since it dries. Sometimes it would pill. For being called Hydro-grip, I don't feel that it did better at gripping or holding my make up in place or helping it last longer than other primers. It made my make up worse.  Sadly, it was past Sephora's return window when I finally gave up, so I wasted money & have 3/4 of a bottle left. I regret buying the full size vs. the mini, but I didn't think it would be this bad because it was highly rated.

reviews.review_title: First primer I’ve tried with skincare ingredients!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Primer is part of my new little summer makeup routine. I love how it preps my skin, allowing my makeup to stay put all day, even when I'm outside in the heat. Typically, my summer look involves this primer, a light serum foundation, and a bit of setting spray, and I’m good to go. One standout ingredient in this primer is blue agave extract, something I've never tried before. It's amazing how it locks in moisture and gives my skin that extra boost of hydration. Plus, it’s packed with hyaluronic acid, a favorite of mine for its skin-plumping and hydrating properties. What I appreciate most is how this primer blends skincare and makeup seamlessly. It’s like having a built-in skincare routine within my makeup application. The lightweight gel texture feels cool and refreshing, and it grips my foundation perfectly without feeling sticky. If you’re into functional makeup products that also take care of your skin, the Hydro Grip Primer is right up your alley. It’s a must-have for keeping your makeup looking fresh and flawless, even on the hottest days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is awesome. It’s super smooth and keeps my makeup in place without getting dry or clumpy. It actually feels moisturizing on my face and is really long lasting. Can’t go wrong with this one! I will say when I don’t wait a minute for it to set, it doesn’t layer as well so I recommend giving it the 60 seconds it needs, then the results are perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have an oily type of skin and I was looking for a light primer to smooth my skin and cover the pores. The Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer by Milk Makeup is a perfect fit for me.  The texture is light, jelly, and hydrating. The inclusion of hyaluronic acid and niacinamide ensures my skin stays moisturized and supple all day. I used a light hydrating serum, let it dry for a few minutes, followed by this product and then my usual makeup routine. It instantly provides a slight glow and moisture and prepares the skin for a perfect makeup application. My makeup looks smooth, natural and lasts longer whenever I use this primer. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_text: I've been using this gel makeup primer for a while now, and it has become a part of my makeup routine. It's a product I highly recommend and will continue to use every day.

Overall, I'm thrilled with the Hydro Grip Primer and will continue to use it as part of my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first experience with Milk and have heard great things. I am really enjoying it. I have fairly enlarged pores so will try ANY primer, this primer does NOT blur my pores that well BUT, I apply it prior to my blurring primer and it’s definitely helped my bluffing primer work even better! And definitely helps my makeup last longer throughout the day. It is a gel like consistency so it is a bit wet and sticky in the beginning, but you just need to give it a few minutes to dry completely before applying anything else. A little goes a very long way and it’s done well with my sensitive skin! I’m a fan so far!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with chronically dry skin, finding the right makeup primer has been an ongoing challenge. I've tried countless options, from silicone-based blurring primers to hydrating serums, but none have quite delivered the results I was looking for - until I discovered Milk Makeup's Hydrogrip Hydrating Makeup Primer.  From the moment I first applied this primer, I could feel the difference. The gel-like formula glides onto the skin effortlessly, providing an instant surge of hydration that leaves my complexion plump and dewy. Unlike some primers that can feel heavy or create a tacky base, the Hydrogrip primer has a lightweight, almost undetectable texture that allows my foundation to apply seamlessly on top.  One of the standout features of this primer is its ability to grip and hold onto my makeup. I've noticed a significant improvement in the longevity of my foundation and concealer when I use the Hydrogrip primer, with my makeup looking fresh and radiant well into the later hours of the day. This is a game-changer for me, as my dry skin often causes my base products to break down and emphasize flakiness by midday.  Beyond its functional benefits, I've also grown to love the soothing, calming effect the Hydrogrip primer has on my skin. The formula is infused with nourishing ingredients like cactus flower, which helps to hydrate and plump the skin, and green tea, which provides antioxidant protection. I find that my complexion feels instantly soothed and refreshed after application, with no irritation or unwanted shine.  As someone who previously struggled to find a primer that could combat my dry skin without compromising the longevity or appearance of my makeup, Milk Makeup's Hydrogrip Hydrating Primer has become an essential part of my daily routine. It greatly transformed the way my foundation applies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Milk Hydro Grip Primer has become essential in my makeup routine. Its gel-based formula hydrates the skin and creates a smooth, tacky surface that enhances foundation adherence and longevity. It provides a refreshing, cooling effect and helps makeup look flawless and vibrant all day. Made with clean ingredients, this primer is highly recommended for its excellent performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This primer gets the hype for a reason! Whenever I use it my makeup stays so nicely all day! I definitely recommend this to anyone who’s looking for a new primer that’s going to help their makeup last longer!

It's been great for my dry patches because it's so hydrating. I wear a matte foundation and my skin still looks moisturized. I love this primer so much. It locks everything in and the beauty doesn't budge! Its now my favorite primer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got the opportunity to try out the Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Primer and think this is a great base for my makeup. This has a lightweight, gel-like consistency with a slightly tacky feeling. I could feel this primer slightly after applying, but the feeling goes away after a few minutes. I applied my skin care as normal, essence, serum, moisturizer and sunscreen and added this as the last step before my makeup routine. This gave my skin a slight luminosity, but did not make my skin look oily. I did a full face of makeup and it lasted through a night out at dinner and a concert, about eight hours. I did have one smudged area where I had scratched my face, but where I did not touch, my makeup looked the same as when I applied it. I even tried a tissue test to see how much my makeup transferred, and it was minimal with this primer. My makeup applied smoothly over this and I noticed no pilling when I used brushes and my fingers to blend my makeup. The application looked great and I found this to be a nice base to work off of. I really enjoy the design of this packaging, as the product was easy to dispense the amount needed and the pump helps to keep things sanitary. Plus, this looks great on a vanity. I would recommend this primer and I think I may have to pick up the matching setting spray to finish my makeup looks with.

My experience: This makeup gel primer feels really silky smooth when applied to the skin, it feels amazing. It gives my skin a perfect hydrated glow ready for my makeup foundation. reviews.review_title: Just an expensive endocrine disrupter and irritant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this primer to try because I loved the fact that it was clear in color. Unfortunately, I will not be buying this product again. The first thing off the bat is how expensive the product is. For someone who doesn't use makeup much, the size is perfect, but for 20 USD, I could probably find a clear one for cheaper at the local store. The other thing I learned after receiving the product is all the harsh chemicals that are in this product which makes it unsuitable for everyday wear. And before people come at me for this one, I am aware most makeup products do include questionable ingredients, for some it's great, but for others not so much. Like most products, this primer has phenoxyethenol which is an endocrine disrupter making it not the safest product to use especially for younger aged girls. Furthermore, there were several ingredients in this product that are considered irritants. I usually do not pay attention to chemicals being labelled irritants as anything can irritate the skin based on the individual's skin; however, I learned with this product that it did indeed irritate my skin. With the first dab of the product, I could feel my face burning from the product. There are other chemicals I could rant about, but I think I mentioned the main one that's good to avoid. I think this was a really neat product to try and the packaging is cute, but it will most likely be a one time purchase for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Milk Makeup’s Mini Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is absolutely incredible! As a makeup and skincare lover, I always look for products that deliver both hydration and longevity, I was intrigued to try this fan-favorite primer in its miniature/travel sized form. The packaging is sleek and convenient, perfect for on-the-go touch-ups or travel. The size may be small, but don’t let it fool you—the performance is mighty. Upon application, the primer’s gel-like texture glides effortlessly onto the skin, showing an instant touch of moisture without feeling heavy or greasy. One of the standout features of this primer is its gripping power. It creates a smooth canvas for makeup application while ensuring that foundation adheres flawlessly and stays put throughout the day. Milk Makeup’s Mini Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is a true gem in the realm of the beauty world. Its compact size, hydrating formula, and impressive staying power make it a must-have for anyone seeking a reliable primer that delivers results. Whether you’re a makeup professional or a beauty novice, this primer deserves a spot in your routine!

reviews.review_title: Disappointing Experience with Milk Makeup Primer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was initially drawn to the Milk Makeup primer due to its positive reviews, stylish packaging, and the appeal of a natural product. However, my excitement quickly turned into disappointment after using it consistently.  Pros:  Attractive packaging: The bottle design is sleek and visually appealing. Natural ingredients: I appreciated the commitment to natural ingredients, which initially influenced my decision to purchase. Cons:  Pilling issues: The major drawback I encountered was the primer causing pilling with whichever foundation I used. This issue persisted, and it became evident that the primer was the culprit. Review: Despite the positive aspects, the pilling problem significantly overshadowed any benefits the primer offered. It was disheartening to invest in a large bottle only to find that it negatively impacted the application of my foundation. I tried various foundations, but the issue persisted consistently.  I had high expectations given the brand's reputation, but unfortunately, the primer did not live up to its promises. If you are considering this primer, be cautious about its compatibility with different foundations.  In conclusion, while the Milk Makeup primer may work well for some, my personal experience with pilling has left me hesitant to recommend it. It's essential to consider your specific foundation and skin type before investing in this product.

reviews.review_title: All Day Hold, Better Suited for Oily & Combo Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited about this product, especially with its claims on providing an 'all day' hold. For the most part, I was able to see that impact loud & clear, but transparently noticed a couple of pitfalls. While my skin initially felt much more hydrated and the primer served as a great base, my skin sensitivity and eczema quickly caught up with me after just a couple of uses. Unfortunately the product triggered some dry, red and flakey skin and caused a bit of irritation. For this reason, I would triple check the ingredient list and ensure it lines up with your routine and skin concerns. I'd say this product aligns better with oily/combo skin vs. dry/sensitive, so just know where you land on the spectrum and the potential impacts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Milk Makeup Mini Hydro Grip Hydrating Makeup Primer is my new morning go to routine, whether I am wearing makeup or not. With/under makeup it sets my makeup smoothly on my skin giving it a finished look. With/without makeup it hydrates my skin that is currently a bit drier due to the weather. Wearing alone gives my skin a dewy glow. Either way, it’s a win-win for me! Great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like it but it made my foundation pill instantly.

reviews.review_title: Pretty SOLID primer! I like it

reviews.review_text: I received the Milk Hydro grip travel size primer in exchange for my honest review from the Skeepers app. I think it made my makeup stay on pretty well. I did a live stream for about 4 hours and everything stayed in place better than normal. I did not notice any creasing. I did two pumps on the back of my hand and it spread out enough to cover my entire face. I did think that it would be stickier than it was but, I liked it in the end. I would purchase this again. The travel size is very convenient for those who are on the go or do not have much space. Feel free to give it a try if you have wanted to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair
reviews.review_text: This product is phenomenal! Super tacky but doesn’t feel sticky or leave my skin feeling sticky, I had been using dupes and wanted to see the real thing and it blew away the other ones I had been using. Left my makeup staying on strong all day! Will be continuing to use

The ease of makeup application with this primer is noteworthy, making it a must-have for a seamless and enduring look. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: This is one of the best primers I’ve tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
